If the ability to repeatly refill your EVA pack bugs you, couldn't you simply not do it?

I always find it funny when people want to change the game because they feel compelled to use the cheats and exploits available.

If the ability to repeatly refill your EVA pack bugs you, couldn't you simply not do it?

No, you could not "simply" do this. The point is not to make it impossible to refill your EVA pack 100% of the time, but to let you do it a certain number of times depending on your fuel stores. Keeping track of how much fuel you have and how much you use is exactly the kind of busywork that computers are made for.
